name: Platform Golf
description: Platform Golf is a 2D physics based arcady golf game. It features a variety of levels with unique designs.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64Bit Processor: Intel® Pentium® N3520 2.17 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64Bit Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
